leads.lead_text: Inflorescence 30–55 mm long, axes not usually glabrescent; leaves 20–50 mm long; pedicels 1.5–3 mm long
Inflorescence 60–170 mm long, axes glabrescent; leaves 55–71 mm long; pedicels 5–8 mm long
